tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Information Exposure due to improperly filtering anonymous tokens when setting the `Results-Filtered-By-ACLs` header, which could allow an attacker to exploit this inconsistency by submitting a specially crafted anonymous token in a request to infer the existence of objects or data they should not have access to, based on whether the header indicates the results were filtered or not.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/hashicorp/consul` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Improper Restriction of Security Token Assignment
